definitions.definition: An act or instance of deflating .
examples: The loss caused utter deflation and disappointment among the fans.

definitions.definition: A decrease in the general price level, that is, in the nominal cost of goods and services as well as wages .
The removal of soil and other loose material from the ground (or another surface ) by wind , leaving it exposed to erosion .

main_definition: An act or instance of deflating .
secondary_definitions: ( economics ) A decrease in the general price level, that is, in the nominal cost of goods and services as well as wages .
( geology ) The removal of soil and other loose material from the ground (or another surface ) by wind , leaving it exposed to erosion .
